text: Willie Julian Usery, Jr. (December 21, 1923 - December 10, 2016) was an American labor union activist and U.S. government politician. He served as United States Secretary of Labor in the Ford administration from 1976 until 1977. Usery, Jr., died on December 10, 2016 in Eatonton, Georgia from heart failure, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:United States Secretaries of Labor Category:American activists Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: William Usery Jr.
